content.title: Intraoperative Transit-Time Flow Measurement
content.description: Quantitative measurement of blood flow through vessels or bypass grafts using ultrasound transit-time technology.
content.mechanism: Measures difference in ultrasound transit time upstream vs downstream through flowing blood to calculate volumetric flow
content.device: MediStim VeriQ or similar flow meter with appropriately sized probe
content.statement: Intraoperative Transit-Time Flow Measurement is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Diagnostics Intraoperative that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
